scripts.build.dev: npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test && npx webpack --config webpack.dev.js && npx rimraf dist/src
scripts.build.release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test.coverage && rimraf dist/src && npx webpack --config webpack.prod.js && npx rimraf dist/src && npm run test.integration && npx rimraf dist/src
scripts.build.all: npm run build.release && npm run docs
scripts.release.patch: npm version patch && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.release.minor: npm version minor && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.release.major: npm version major && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.orchestrate.release: npm run build.release && npm pack && npm run publish.release
scripts.publish.release: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.graph.deps: npx depcruise --validate --exclude "(spec|^node_modules)" .dependency-cruiser.js --include-only '^src' --output-type dot src | dot -T jpg > dist/dependencygraph.jpg
scripts.docs: npx rimraf docs && npm run graph.deps && npx typedoc --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json ./src
